quote_first: She backed down the driveway, checked for traffic, and turned toward the turnpike.
quote_last:
. Plenty of time.
That’s what she thought then.
title: If it Bleeds
author: Stephen King

quote_last: in Archie McCue’s room on the third floor of the extension to the Robert Matthews’ soaring sixties’ tower - The Queen’s Tower, although no queen was ever likely to live in it.
title: Emotionally Weird
author: Kate Atkinson
